1.text: Welcome to the game, what's your name?

4.text:
Clara : Wake up! We were supposed to go hunting ages ago.
|playername| : ZZZZ...
Clara: WAKE UP!
|playername| : One more minute
Clara : I'm gonna drag you into the woods if you won't WAKE UP
|playername| : alright alright

     You slowly rise from your bed, gather your hunting equipment and leave your cottage. The village is almost empty, everyone already busy with their daily tasks

5.text: raspberry is also good, but come on  chocolate is simply superior
